## Testing Instructions

### Download PR Artifacts for Local Testing

The CI workflow automatically builds localization files for each PR. You can download and test them:

  - Go to the "Checks" tab at the top of this PR
  - Click on the "CI" workflow run
  - Scroll down to the "Artifacts" section (if you are on the new UI it should be on the top of the screen instead as 'Artifacts')
  - Download `localization-zips` artifact
  - 
Then, extract and test:

   - Extract the downloaded ZIP file
   - Copy the `.loc.zip` files to your VTOL VR localization directory
   - Launch VTOL VR and verify the translations in-game
